thread.title: Kari Burgold Fredrick
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Kari Burgold Fredrick

author: Kari Burgold Fredrick
title: Kari Burgold Fredrick
text: I am a book LOVER/Hoarder AND giver and I love this site. I have been able to order great condition copies of books that I love and want to give to friends. There are very few books on my list that they haven't had or gotten in a reasonable time. Absolutely recommend anyone who is a reader to open an account ASAP!
